urls.title: Coastal Communities Adapting Together Exchanging Knowledge and Best Practice Across Borders - CCAT Project
urls.description: As climate change and sustainability become central elements of policy making there is an opportunity to learn from others and to build on existing best practice in coastal management, climate change and adaptation. The Coastal Communities Adapting Together (CCAT) event hosted by Fingal County Council and Cardiff University brought  together a diverse range of practitioners […]

urls.title: What to do in a flood - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

text: Flooding, especially flash flooding, can leave you with little time to prepare. Watch the video below and join us for Flood Action Week with the @EnvAgency to learn how to be more prepared for flooding. More about the campaign and flood awareness at https://t.co/tSd9mjMCZr ⛈️🌨️ https://t.co/0cPZ8dIbNT

We can't ignore climate & nature within the covid recession recovery. The government kickstart a low-carbon economy and put the UK on track to meet the target of net zero emissions by 2050. @wwf_uk @EmmaHowardBoyd @EnvAgency https://t.co/i4GlA8yfcW #climatetargets #insulation
